name: Brusselator chemical oscillator (limit cycle)
equations: dx/dt = A - (B+1)x + x^2 y; dy/dt = Bx - x^2 y
description_simple: A chemical reaction model that generates stable oscillations.
description_complex: The Brusselator is a two-species autocatalytic chemical model. For typical parameters, trajectories converge to a stable periodic orbit representing chemical oscillations. The system has no chaotic attractor, no positive Lyapunov exponent, and no sensitive dependence on initial conditions.
